Package org.apache.zookeeper.server.backup

Class BackupManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.zookeeper.server.backup.BackupManager
  • public class BackupManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the backing up of txnlog and snap files to remote storage for longer term and durable retention than is possible on an ensemble server

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  BackupManager.BackupFile
      Tracks a file that needs to be backed up, including temporary copies of the file
      protected class  BackupManager.SnapBackup
      Implements snapshot specific logic for BackupProcess
      protected class  BackupManager.TxnLogBackup
      Implements txnlog specific logic for BackupProcess
